snippet.title: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Rescue Team DX—Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
In 2006, the Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team and Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Blue Rescue Team games were released for the Game Boy Advance and Nintendo DS systems in Japan.

In 2020, these titles will gain a new life on Nintendo Switch.

Get ready for Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Rescue Team DX, coming to Nintendo Switch on March 6, 2020!

Official site: https://www.pokemon.com
Shop: http://www.pokemoncenter.com
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Pokemon 
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/Pokemon 
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/pokemon
